mapper.select: SELECT E.WORKPLACE_CODE , E.EMP_CODE , E.EMP_NAME , TO_CHAR(E.BIRTHDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') BIRTHDATE , E.GENDER , E.MOBILE_NUMBER , E.ADDRESS , E.DETAIL_ADDRESS , E.POST_NUMBER , E.EMAIL , E.LAST_SCHOOL , E.IMG_EXTEND , PD.DEPT_NAME , PD.POSITION FROM EMP E , (SELECT * FROM POSITION P, DEPT D) PD WHERE e.EMP_NAME = #{empName} AND E.POSITION_CODE = PD.POSITION_CODE(+) AND E.DEPT_CODE = PD.DEPT_CODE(+) ORDER BY E.EMP_CODE
SELECT EMP_CODE FROM EMP WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY EMP_CODE DESC

SELECT E.EMP_CODE , E.EMP_NAME , TO_CHAR(E.BIRTHDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') BIRTHDATE , E.GENDER , E.MOBILE_NUMBER , E.ADDRESS , E.DETAIL_ADDRESS , E.POST_NUMBER , E.EMAIL , E.LAST_SCHOOL , E.IMG_EXTEND , PD.DEPT_NAME , PD.POSITION FROM EMP E , (SELECT * FROM POSITION P, DEPT D) PD WHERE 1=1 AND E.POSITION_CODE = PD.POSITION_CODE(+) AND E.DEPT_CODE = PD.DEPT_CODE(+) ORDER BY E.EMP_CODE

SELECT E.EMP_CODE , E.EMP_NAME , TO_CHAR(E.BIRTHDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') BIRTHDATE , E.GENDER , E.MOBILE_NUMBER , E.ADDRESS , E.DETAIL_ADDRESS , E.POST_NUMBER , E.EMAIL , E.LAST_SCHOOL , E.IMG_EXTEND , PD.DEPT_NAME , PD.POSITION FROM EMP E , (SELECT * FROM POSITION P, DEPT D) PD WHERE 1=1 AND E.POSITION_CODE = PD.POSITION_CODE(+) AND E.DEPT_CODE = PD.DEPT_CODE(+) AND PD.DEPT_NAME = #{dept} ORDER BY E.EMP_CODE

SELECT E.EMP_CODE , E.EMP_NAME , TO_CHAR(E.BIRTHDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') BIRTHDATE , E.GENDER , E.MOBILE_NUMBER , E.ADDRESS , E.DETAIL_ADDRESS , E.POST_NUMBER , E.EMAIL , E.LAST_SCHOOL , E.IMG_EXTEND , PD.DEPT_NAME , PD.POSITION FROM EMP E , (SELECT * FROM POSITION P, DEPT D) PD WHERE 1=1 AND E.POSITION_CODE = PD.POSITION_CODE(+) AND E.DEPT_CODE = PD.DEPT_CODE(+) AND E.EMP_NAME = #{name} ORDER BY E.EMP_CODE

SELECT E.EMP_CODE, E.EMP_NAME, TO_CHAR(E.BIRTHDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') BIRTHDATE , E.GENDER, E.MOBILE_NUMBER, E.ADDRESS , E.DETAIL_ADDRESS, E.POST_NUMBER, E.EMAIL , E.LAST_SCHOOL, E.IMG_EXTEND, PD.DEPT_NAME, PD.POSITION , EV.ACHIEVEMENT, EV.ABILITY, EV.ATTITUDE , PD.LICENSE_CODE, PD.LICENSE_NAME, PD.GET_DATE, PD.EXPIRE_DATE, PD.LICENSE_LEVEL , PD.LICENSE_CENTER, PD.ISSUE_NUMBER, PD.EMP_CODE AS L_EMP_CODE , PD.W_DEPT_NAME AS W_DEPT_NAME, PD.W_EMP_CODE AS W_EMP_CODE , PD.EMPLOYMENT_TYPE, PD.HIREDATE, PD.HOBONG, PD.OCCUPATION, PD.RETIRE_DATE , PD.SALARY_TYPE, PD.WORK_INFO_DAYS , PD.F_EMP_CODE AS F_EMP_CODE, PD.FAMILY_CODE, PD.FAMILY_NAME, PD.RELATION, PD.BIRTHDATE AS F_BIRTHDATE , PD.LIVE_TOGETHER FROM EMP E, (SELECT P.POSITION_CODE, P.POSITION, D.DEPT_CODE, D.DEPT_NAME, L.LICENSE_CODE, L.LICENSE_NAME, L.GET_DATE, L.EXPIRE_DATE, L.LICENSE_LEVEL, L.LICENSE_CENTER, L.ISSUE_NUMBER, L.EMP_CODE, W.DEPT_NAME AS W_DEPT_NAME, W.EMP_CODE AS W_EMP_CODE, W.EMPLOYMENT_TYPE, W.HIREDATE, W.HOBONG, W.OCCUPATION, W.RETIRE_DATE, W.SALARY_TYPE, W.WORK_INFO_DAYS, F.EMP_CODE AS F_EMP_CODE, F.FAMILY_CODE, F.FAMILY_NAME, F.RELATION, F.BIRTHDATE, F.LIVE_TOGETHER FROM POSITION P, DEPT D, LICENSE_INFO L, WORK_INFO W, FAMILY_INFO F WHERE W.EMP_CODE = #{empCode}) PD, (SELECT * FROM EMP_EVAL) EV WHERE 1=1 AND E.POSITION_CODE = PD.POSITION_CODE(+) AND E.DEPT_CODE = PD.DEPT_CODE(+) AND E.EMP_CODE = #{empCode} AND E.EMP_CODE = EV.EMP_CODE(+) ORDER BY E.EMP_CODE
